name: The Milton S Hershey Medical Center

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: The Milton S Hershey Medical Center is a General Acute Care Hospital provider based in Hershey, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $78.9M in Medicaid payments across 1.6M claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $78.9M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
